additions.Empowering Through Education: Wi de ɛp pipul tru ɛdyukeshɔn
additions.Access world-class digital skills traini: Gɛt wɔl-klas dijital skeyl trenin, kɔnɛkt wit mɛntɔ dɛm we go inspaya yu, ɛn diskɔva chans dɛm we go chenj wok ɛn kɔmyuniti dɛm
additions.Discover world-class courses designed to: Diskɔva wɔl-klas kɔs dɛm we dɛn mek fɔ ɛp yu bild dijital skeyl dɛm we pipul dɛn want
additions.Enrolled Courses: Kɔs dɛm we yu dɔn jɔyn
additions.Hours Learned: Awa dɛm we yu dɔn lan
additions.You need 70% to pass. Try again!: Yu nid 70% fɔ pas. Tray bak!
additions.Question: Kwɛshɔn
additions.You can now browse job opportunities: Yu kin luk wok chans dɛm naw
